name: webgenjs
description: A library interpreting a JavaScript object structure as XML or HTML/CSS for generating a markup document.
author: Magnus Ernstsson <magnus.ernstsson@patchworksolutions.com>

scripts.test: whiskey --coverage -t "test/classgen-test.js test/cssgen-test.js test/htmlgen-test.js test/stringgen-test.js test/stylegen-test.js test/xmlgen-test.js test/htmlutils-test.js test/styleutils-test.js"
